name: Field Lights
description:
Field Lights is a physics-based 2D platformer with a minimalistic design.  It's a simple, "collect the items then reach the goal" objective game.  I'm experimenting with different types of obstacles and player designs so a lot is subject to change.  N++ kind of inspires me so I might go down a similar path.   It is intended for Android but for now, I'm testing it only on PC. 

It supports both keyboard and controllers.
